attributes.action:
We the undersigned call upon HM Government to:
•Trigger Article 50 immediately
attributes.additional_details:
We, your country Men and Women who voted to leave the EU call upon HM Government to implement Article 50 as promised by David Cameron in February should a ‘Leave’ European Referendum vote be successful.
This great democratic conglomerate of countries has voted to separate from Europe.
Now more than any other time in our history, we need faith in our leaders. Please confirm this by being strong and following the will of the people who vote.
attributes.background: The voters who signed this petition are particularly panicked that Mr Cameron, in a last ditch attempt to delay this ‘Pushing of the button’ has bought some time with a view to somehow managing a re-negotiation with the Eu or even worse, completely overturning the democratic decision to leave.
